DataElement.preferredName: Registration Service Research Resource Negation Active Comment ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The service of recording subject participation on a study. The service may include allocation to an Arm or a portion of an Arm (when secondary allocations may occur). Additional description why the resource is no longer active.
